t: I*pn will sing of faithful love and justice; I*ln will sing praise to you, Lord.*s
I*ln will pay attention to the way of integrity. When*ln will you come to me? I*ln will live with a heart of integrity in my house.
I*ln will not let anything worthless guide me. I*ln hate the practice of transgression; it*ln will not cling to me.
A*ln devious heart will be far from me; I*ln will not be involved with evil.
I*pn will destroy anyone who*ln secretly slanders his neighbor; I*ln cannot tolerate anyone with*ln haughty eyes or an arrogant heart.
My*ln eyes favor the faithful of the land so*ln that they may sit down with me. The*ln one who follows the way of integrity may*ln serve me.
No*ln one who acts deceitfully will*ln live in my palace; the*ln one who tells lies will*ln not be retained here to guide me.
Every*ln morning I will destroy all*ln the wicked of the land, wiping*ln out all evildoers from the Lordâ€™s*s city.
